title: nADi vandEn unnaDi
sahitya:
nADi vandEn unnaDi tEDi vandEn nAn pADi undan pugazhai paravasham uravE murugA


anupallavi

  vADit-tuyar urAdu vAzhvidu niraivura nADum unnaruL kai kUDumena nambi


caraNam    kEDugaL aDuttennaik-koDuttup-parppala pADugaL paDuttiyE paDu kuzhiyil kiDatti
nIDittu mEnmElum kUDiDAmal ODiDa sADum un kara vElum ADum mayilum tuNai ena
